bill.title: RPM Act of 2019 Recognizing the Protection of Motorsports Act of 2019
bill.description: To amend the Clean Air Act to provide an exemption from certain antitampering provisions for certain actions for modifying a motor vehicle that is not legal for operation on a street or highway and is to be used solely for competition, and for other purposes.

history.action: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment and Climate Change.
